courseDetails.title: HTML & CSS - Certification Course for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Lean the Foundations of HTML & CSS to Create Fully Customized, Mobile Responsive Web Pages
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the HTML & CSS – Certification Course for Beginners

This two-part series provides an in-depth look at the fundamentals of coding in HTML and CSS. We start by exploring HTML Development using some of the most commonly used tags and attributes. Students will learn the composition of an HTML file, and some of the essential components. Students will work with HTML Spacing, Text Formatting, Lists, Images, Embedding Videos, Link Creation, Tables, and Forms. We also include a hands-on project, that helps solidify the concepts we explore in the course.

After the HTML Section, students will dive into CSS to fully customize the look of their web pages. We provide an extensive overview of CSS attributes, components, and positioning. This includes:

  • Parts of a CSS Rule

  • CSS Divisions

  • CSS IDs

  • Color Codes

  • Applying Borders, Backgrounds, and Styling Images

  • CSS Positioning, including Static, Relative, Absolute, and Fixed

  • CSS Z-Indexing, Styling Links, and Styling Tables.

Through a hands-on project, students will also build a fully customized, responsive website using both HTML5 and CSS3.

If you are serious about taking your coding skills to the next level, enroll in this course today!
targetAudiences: Beginner Web Developers who want to learn to Code in HTML & CSS
Students interested in building Customized Mobile Responsive Web Pages

courseDetails.title: Ultimate Beginner Guide to Streamlabs OBS (OBS)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn everything you need about livestreaming on Twitch, YouTube, Mixer and more with SLOBS fast and easy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Ultimate Beginner Guide to Streamlabs OBS (OBS)!

Nick Nyxson here, Your Instructor for this course.

In this course, you will learn how to start using  Streamlabs OBS which is live streaming software made by Streamlabs and is a modified version of Open Broadcaster Software (OBS).

In this course You Will Learn:

  • What is SLOBS (Streamlabs OBS);

  • How Streamlabs OBS is any different from OBS Studio;

  • Streamlabs OBS Settings Walkthrough;

  • Streamlabs OBS Sources and Scenes;

  • Steamlabs OBS Tabs;

  • and Much, Much More!

Everything you will learn here will be based on My practice as a video content creator and Streamer and Everything shown step by step as I am performing everything live on video.

Most importantly this course will continue and grow as time passes and all the upgrades will be available for FREE for every enrolled student.

And don't forget that Instructor is here for you. For any questions do not hesitate to ask, I will try to answer any of your questions as fast and as detailed as possible.

Join me in this amazing journey and I hope to see you in class :)


Disclaimer: This course is made for beginners in live streaming, Open Broadcaster Software (OBS), and Streamlabs OBS (SLOBS).


Version History:

  • Version 1.0 - Initial Release;

  • Version 1.1 - Added New "Introduction" and "Basics" Sections, New Logo.
targetAudiences: People willing to livestream
Gamers
Streamers

courseDetails.title: BWA/GuV mit Excel erstellen
courseDetails.shortDescription: Wie Sie mit Excel eine professionelle BWA erstellen, die automatisch die richtigen Monate anzeigt
courseDetails.longDescription:
Allgemein

Wenn wir selbstständig sind, gehört es dazu auch eine BWA zu erstellen.

Nicht immer möchten wir dabei die Vorlage vom Steuerberater benutzen. Schon gar nicht soll es so sein, dass die einzelnen Kosten mühselig mit dem Taschenrechner berechnet und dann in der BWA eingetragen werden müssen. Dabei können schnell Fehler entstehen.


In diesem Kurs lernen Sie, wie Sie mit Excel eine professionelle BWA erstellen, die Ihre Einnahmen und Ausgaben richtig erfasst und auch dass die Monate richtig übertragen werden.


Inhalt

  • Aufbau der BWA/GuV

  • Excel Vorlage

  • Erfassung der Ein- und Ausgaben nach Monaten

  • Automatisierung mit Excel-Formeln

Zusätzlich erhalten Sie die Excel-Vorlage mit den fertigen Lösungen, die Sie bei Bedarf individuell anpassen können.
targetAudiences: Selbstständige
Junior Controller
Assistenten kaufmännische Leitung
Buchhalter

courseDetails.title: Utreon Masterclass - Ultimate Guide to YouTube Alternative
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn about Content Creation on Utreon - The newest YouTube Alternative
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Utreon Masterclass - Ultimate Guide to YouTube Alternative!

The only course you will need to start with Utreon, one of the best and newest video hosting platforms and YouTube alternatives for aspiring content creators.

Utreon is a relatively new video hosting platform that allows you to host your channel and content and gain access to large and untapped audiences that is simply impossible to reach nowadays on YouTube. For that reason, Utreon is deemed as one of the best YouTube alternatives today where creators can reach large portions of audiences without inhuman amounts of effort.

Here you will learn everything you need to know about Utreon, including but not limited to:

  • Basics & Interface of Utreon;

  • Tools and Features of Utreon;

  • How to Become a Creator on Utreon;

  • Uploading and Scheduling Videos on Utreon;

  • Everything about Content Distribution on Utreon;

  • Video Customisation;

  • Utreon Content Monetisation;

  • Practical tips & Tricks;

  • & Much More...

Everything you will learn here will be based on My practice as a content creator and Utreon creator and Everything shown step by step as I am performing everything live on video.

Most importantly this course will continue and grow as time passes and all the upgrades will be available for FREE for every enrolled student.

And don't forget that Instructor is here for you. For any questions do not hesitate to ask.

Join me in this amazing journey and I hope to see you in class :)
targetAudiences: Content Creators
People Looking for Alternatives to YouTube

courseDetails.title: TikTok Marketing 2021 | Go Viral With Authentic Videos!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Grow 10,000+ Followers on TikTok in one Month.  Understand the ins-and-outs of the platform to go viral.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Social Savvy Insider for TikTok!

For licensing inquiries email: skyler@weresocialsavvy.com

Language: English

----------------------------------------

Hi! My name is Skyler, Co-Founder of Social Savvy LA (Digital Marketing Agency)

This is the most educational TikTok course under 2 hours on the market. Guaranteed! This course is hyper-focused on the most effective tactics of marketing through TikTok. For this course to be applied to your page, you should have an intermediate level of understanding of social media platforms and their basic functionality.  We'll teach you all you need to know about TikTok along with advanced techniques and valuable strategies.

TikTok is one of the most powerful social media platforms to this date and only growing. As a free platform with over 1 Billion users, you have endless opportunities to grow and increase your business revenue through TikTok marketing without a following. You just need to know the latest tips and strategies. In this course, we teach you the most lucrative and valuable strategies to date resulting in targeted traffic, organic followers, and loyal customers.

TikTok is one of the most effective marketing platforms to gain new customers:

THIS course will change your perspective on TikTok marketing and teach you everything you need to know to successfully market your business on the platform.

My team and I spent months making a course that is strictly the most effective information on TikTok Marketing! We did not want to waste students' time with nonsense episodes you’re not likely to even finish. This course is full of the MOST crucial TikTok Marketing knowledge to date.


We made it easy to follow along with screen recordings and step-by-step breakdowns of techniques. Not to mention, we make it fun to watch so you don’t get bored learning. This course contains the knowledge you should know to be ahead of your competition in 2021. We show you all the tools to create engaging content, properly edit videos, follow trends and sounds for your niche, post accordingly to your analytics, grow your TikTok followers, and many more tactics. Ultimately resulting in sales to your business from targeted customers.

Online shoppers measure your trustworthiness and credibility based on your social media presence. By learning the ins and outs of profile presence and how to gain thousands of active followers, your profile will have a higher conversion rate of follows, sales, and professional business connections.

Social Savvy Insider Overview

This TikTok course contains over 50 lectures and 1 1/2 hours of content. It's crafted for anyone who wants to learn how to use TikTok to grow your page with REAL organic followers. We pride ourselves on being up to date with new TikTok algorithms and updates for TikTok growth and sales. You will have lifetime unlimited access to this course.

As an owner of a digital marketing agency that’s served hundreds of clients, PR agencies, and big brands; I’ve learned the ins and outs of modern-day social media marketing. My team and I have had many clients who could not afford our services but wish to work with us. After many months we decided to create a course full of the knowledge we provide through our services at an affordable price for everyone. The tips and secrets we share in this course come from our services that large brands pay us thousands per month to provide. We’re excited to share this knowledge with the public through a fun and exciting course that’s not too long! At the end of every chapter, we always recap the lectures you learned (sometimes while making a cup of coffee).

We look forward to connecting with you as well. We are here as a team to answer questions, hear your feedback and success stories.


After you complete this course, you will have a high-level understanding of TikTok marketing in 2021.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in learning TikTok for business
Anyone looking to learn TikTok Marketing

courseDetails.title: Der Komplette Excel Kurs - Vom Anfänger zum Profi in 40h !
courseDetails.shortDescription: Der 40 Stunden Excel-Kurs - Alles in einem Kurs (Diagramme, Pivots, VBA) - Vom absoluten Anfänger zum echten Excel Profi
courseDetails.longDescription:
Letzte Aktualisierung: 5.11.2021

*** DER KURS WIRD LAUFEND ERWEITERT -> neue Inhalte jeden Monat! *** 


LERNE EXCEL VON DER ERSTEN FORMEL BIS HIN ZUM KOMPLEXEN VBA MAKRO!
Damit kannst Du jedes Excel-Problem lösen - das bedeutet, Du bist im Berufsleben unverzichtbar!


Darf ich Dir zunächst ein paar Fragen stellen?

  • Möchtest Du mit Microsoft Excel wirklich durchstarten - um Dir Deine Jobs in Zukunft aussuchen zu können?

  • Lernst Du auch gerne durch PRAKTISCHE Erklärungen mit ECHTEN Beispielen?

  • Du willst nicht nur für den Kurs vorbereiteten Beispiele, die in der Praxis doch nicht relevant sind?

  • Du willst Erfahrungen und Best Practices aus 25 Jahren Excel-Erfahrung hören?

  • Du willst die Excel Funktionen in der RICHTIGEN Reihenfolge lernen, in der Du sie brauchst?

    ...dann bist Du hier genau richtig!


✅  MODUL 1: Microsoft Excel für Einsteiger - von der ersten Formel zum sicheren Umgang mit Excel
Hier lernst Du von Grund auf Excel kennen. Du lernst:

  • Wo Du  Excel überhaupt herbekommst

  • Wie Du Microsoft Excel installierst und damit umgehst

  • Wozu Formeln gut sind und wie Du sie benutzt

  • Grundrechenarten, Zahlenformate, automatische Berechnungen

  • Diagramme zu erstellen und sinnvoll zu nutzen

  • Logische Formeln und verschachtelte Funktionen(!)

  • Verweis-Funktionen zur intelligenten Verknüpfung von Tabellen


✅  MODUL 2: Excel für Fortgeschrittene - mit 3 Projekten zum Excel-Profi
Hier erarbeiten wir fortgeschrittene Excel-Funktionen im Rahmen von drei praxisnahen Projekten.

  • Projekt 1: Daten in Excel professionell verwalten

    • Hier lernst Du anhand eines realistischen Falles die sinnvollsten Funktionen um Umgang von Daten in großen Tabellen kennen.

    • Es geht um Verweise auf fremde Daten, Konsistenz und eine Menge Zeitersparnis im Alltag.

    • Wir gehen alles Schritt für Schritt durch, alle Zwischenergebnisse sind für Dich zum Download verfügbar.

  • Projekt 2: Clevere Zeiterfassung in Excel selbst aufbauen

    • In diesem Projekt geht es um den Umgang mit Zeit.

    • Wir bauen uns eine eigene Zeiterfassung mit Pausen, automatischer Erkennung von Überstunden und Wochenenden

    • Und ganz nebenbei lernst Du, wie Du in Exel mit Zeiten rechnen kannst

  • Projekt 3: Mit Pivot-Tabellen verborgene Schätze heben

    • Vermutlich jeder hat schon mal das Wort Pivot-Tabelle gehört, aber viele wissen nicht, wie sie selbst eine erstellen können.

    • Dabei ist es sehr einfach, intuitiv und spaßig! Du kannst damit kinderleicht große Datenmengen auswerten und Zahlen endlich sichtbar machen.

    • Wir gehen hier alle wichtige Funktionen Schritt für Schritt an einem realistischen Beispiel durch.


✅  MODUL 3: Excel VBA Makros - Lass Excel für Dich arbeiten!
Hier lernst Du die Magie der Excel-Automatisierung kennen!

  • Wusstest Du, dass man in Excel richtige Programme schreiben kann, die Dir die Arbeit abnehmen? 

  • Du lernst zuerst den Makro-Rekorder kennen, die "Einstiegsdroge" in Richtung Programmierung.

  • Mit vielen kleinen Beispielen arbeiten wir uns gemeinsam vor, bis Du Dir in Excel eigene Programme schreiben kannst, die Dir sehr viel Zeit sparen werden.


✅  MODUL 4: Excel Best Practices - mit wenig Aufwand viel erreichen!

  • Dieser Kurs fasst die wichtigsten Best Practices aus 25 Jahren Excel zusammen!

  • Wusstest Du, dass 80% der Excel-Probleme im Alltag mir nur wenigen Funktionen zu lösen sind?

  • In diesem Kurs lernst Du die besten pragmatischen Lösungen in Excel, die Dich in kurzer Zeit nach vorne katapultieren!

✅  MODUL 5: Entwickle das berühmte "All Purpose Excel Kopiertool" selbst

  • Das All Purpose Excel Kopiertool habe ich in meinem Job als Unternehmensberater entwickelt und 10 Jahre lang wie einen Schatz gehütet.

  • Es ist ein automatisiertes Kopiertool, das Daten zwischen Excel-Tabellen austauscht, zum Beispiel für regelmäßige Management-Reportings.

  • Das Tool kann von jedermann bedient werden und spart in der Praxis extrem viel Zeit - außerdem beeindruckst du damit Deine Chefs und Kollegen!


✅  MODUL 6: Beherrsche Excel Pivot-Tabellen in kurzer Zeit!

  • Excel Pivot-Tabellen sind in aller Munde  - jeder Excel-User kann damit eine Menge Zeit sparen und beeindruckende Berichte erstellen.

  • Dabei sind sie einfach zu bedienen und zu erlernen - und genau das lernst Du in diesem Modul!

  • Du wirst mit Pivot-Tabellen in Sekunden gigantische Datenmengen erfassen und damit tolle und unterhaltsame Übersichten und Diagramme zaubern können - und das ganz ohne Aufwand!


✅  MODUL 7: VBA Makro Programmierung für Fortgeschrittene

  • An dieser Stelle tauchen wir noch etwas tiefer in die VBA-Welt ein.

  • Du lernst praktische Dinge kennen wie z.b. die sogenannten Workbook- und Worksheet-Funktionen. Damit kannst Du Programme vollautomatisch starten, was Dir viel Sicherheit und Zeit bringt.

  • Es macht sehr viel Spaß, das Erscheinungsbild von Excel zu ändern, beispielsweise mit coolen Infoboxen.

targetAudiences: Du bist in Deinem Job auf Microsoft Excel angewiesen...
Oder Du beschäftigst Dich privat oder hobbymäßig mit Excel
Du möchtest die wirklich relevanten Formeln und Funktionen in der richtigen Reihenfolge lernen
Du willst Excel beherrschen, von der allerersten Formel bis zum selbst programmierten Makro

courseDetails.title: Instagram Marketing 2021 | Grow Organic Followers Naturally!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Grow Organic Targeted Followers, Quick Brand Awareness, & Turn Page Visits Into Paying Customers w/ Instagram Marketing
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Social Savvy Insider!

***Over 10,000 students enrolled in 3 days of this course going live***

***Now 100,000+ students enrolled***

Language: English

----------------------------------------

Hi! My name is Skyler, Co-Founder of Social Savvy LA (Influencer Marketing Growth Agency)

This is the most educational course under 2 hours on the market. This course is hyper-focused on the most effective tactics of marketing through Instagram. For this course to be applied to your page, you should have an intermediate level of understanding of the platform and its basic functionality.

Instagram is one of the most powerful social media platforms to this date and only growing. As a free platform with over 1 Billion Instagram users, you have endless opportunities to grow and increase your business revenue through Instagram marketing. You just need to know the latest tips and strategies. In this course, we teach you the most lucrative and valuable strategies to date resulting in targeted traffic, organic followers, and loyal customers.

Instagram is one of the most effective marketing platforms to gain new customers:

THIS course will change your perspective on Instagram marketing and teach you everything you need to know to successfully market your business on the platform.

My team and I spent months making a course that is strictly the most effective information on Instagram Marketing! We did not want to waste students' time with nonsense episodes you’re not likely to even finish. This course is full of the MOST crucial Instagram Marketing knowledge to date.


We made it easy to follow along with screen recordings and step-by-step breakdowns of techniques. Not to mention, we make it fun to watch so you don’t get bored learning. This course contains the knowledge you should know to be ahead of your competition in 2020. We show you all the tools to create/source quality content, properly edit photos, post accordingly to your analytics, grow your Instagram followers, and many more tactics. Ultimately resulting in sales to your business from targeted customers.

Online shoppers measure your trustworthiness and credibility based on your Instagram presence. By learning the ins and outs of profile presence and how to gain thousands of active followers, your profile will have a higher conversion rate of follows, sales, and professional business connections.

Social Savvy Insider Overview

This Instagram course contains over 50 lectures and 1 1/2 hours of content. It's crafted for anyone who wants to learn how to use Instagram to grow your page with REAL organic followers. We pride ourselves on being up to date with new Instagram algorithms and updates for Instagram growth and sales. You will have lifetime unlimited access to this course.

A bonus episode will be coming soon!

As an owner of a digital marketing agency that’s served hundreds of clients, PR agencies, and big brands, I’ve learned the ins and outs of modern-day Instagram marketing. My team and I have had many clients who could not afford our services but wish to work with us. After many months we decided to create a course full of the knowledge we provide through our services at an affordable price for everyone. The tips and secrets we share in this course come from our services that large brands pay us thousands per month to provide. We’re excited to share this knowledge with the public through a fun and exciting course that’s not too long! At the end of every chapter, we always recap the lectures you learned while making a cup of coffee.

We look forward to connecting with you as well. We are here as a team to answer questions, feedback, and hear your success stories.


After you complete this course, you will have a high-level understanding of Instagram marketing in 2020 from the millennial perspective.


We’re excited to see you in the course!

- Skyler and the Social Savvy Team
targetAudiences: This course if for personal pages, business pages and theme pages.
This course is for all ages and niche's looking to increase their Instagram following organically and increase sales through Instagram marketing.
